_header: All that willen hear in rhyme / How good men in old time
Subjects: Alexis, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: The Life of St Alexis — in l2-line stanzas

BodLauMis622.First Lines:
Alle þat willen here in rymeHou gode men in olde
                    tyme…
BodLauMis622.Last Lines:
…ffor þorouȝ þee spryngeþ al
                    goodWiþouten any endynge
